attributes.action: Speak to the world leaders to create a permanent Olympic stadium in Greece.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the countries that compete in the Olympic games contribute towards the building and upkeep of an Olympic stadium complex and the accommodation and support buildings that go with this. This is all to be built as close as possible to the site of the original stadium at Olympia in Greece and that the Olympics are held here every four years.
